timeline.bodyText:
@srnagar Was wondering if something like this could work, where we convert the long value to OffsetDateTime in the getter only?
As we still need the JsonProperty to be a long value for serializing to expirationDateTimeTicks here
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: This is an autogenerated class. It shouldn't be modified.
replies.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText:
From discussion offline, it seems like this is not an autogenerate class. Fix the license header for this file.
Converting long to UTC OffsetDateTime type is fine but it should be done in the constructor once insted of doing it every time this method is called. Also, fix the javadoc for this method.
replies.author: srnagar
